title: Nose and Tina
creator_credit: Norma Bailey, Wolf Koenig and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Nose and Tina are two people in love. He works as a brakeman, she as a hooker. This documentary film captures the domestic details of their life together, and their problems with the law, work and money. Theirs is an unusual love story.
